UNINTER International University Center
Curitiba, PR
Graduate
Data Sciences and Artificial Intelligence
The course is aimed at professionals who work or wish to work in the data sciences and artificial intelligence segment that are added to conducting business or project management. This course presents the fundamentals necessary to understand the operating mechanisms of different technologies in artificial intelligence. It has theoretical disciplines that aim to explore concepts and techniques underlying artificial intelligence and data application. The curriculum is divided into subjects linked to content related to AI and traditional management subjects.
2020 - 2023
(Done)
UNINTER International University Center
Curitiba, PR
Undergraduate
Analysis and systems development
The area of ​​information technology (IT) and software development is a vast universe of options. In the Systems Analysis and Development course you will investigate all these areas, and also work with languages ​​and technologies that are up to date with the market, such as Python, Java, and JavaScript, among others. However, this course is not just for those who want to program. If you are interested in infrastructure, computer networks, or even IT management, welcome! Furthermore, you will be able to choose and specialize in one of three profiles throughout the course: front-end development, back-end development and software quality.
